Neighbors Property¶

class NeighborProperty.NeighborsProperty(points, *args)[source]¶

Property that holds the neighbors of each point

Attributes

Points Holds the points dataset
Raster Holds raster dataset
Size Return the size of the property

Methods

GetAllPointsNeighbors() All neighbors of all computed points :return:
GetPointNeighborsByCoordinates(…[, …])
GetPointsNeighborsByID(pointset_open3d, idx, …) Get the neighbors of a point within a point cloud by its index.
getValues() Get a specific characteristic value of the property
save(filename, **kwargs) Save the property in either json or hdf5.
setValues(*args, **kwargs) Sets the values of a property.
GetAllPointsNeighbors()[source]¶

All neighbors of all computed points :return:

GetPointNeighborsByCoordinates(pointset_open3d, point, searchRadius, maxNN, useOriginal=False)[source]¶
GetPointsNeighborsByID(pointset_open3d, idx, searchRadius, maxNN, returnValues=True, override=False, useOriginal=False)[source]¶

Get the neighbors of a point within a point cloud by its index.

Parameters:
  • pointset_open3d (PointSetOpen3D) – the point set on which the neighbors are looked for
  • idx (int) – point index
  • searchRadius (float) – the search radius for neighbors
  • maxNN (int) – maximum number of neighbors
  • returnValues (bool) – default: True
  • override (bool) – default: False
  • useOriginal (bool) – default: False
Returns:

the neighborhood property
Return type:

NeighborsProperty
